parts: (a) how many hectares of land were held by Jifumpa Mine in Kasempa District, as of July, 2020;
(b) whether the land was on title;
(c) if so when the title was issued;
(d) whether the displaced households had been resettled and compensated, as of July, 2020;
(e) whether the Jifumpa Mine has any corporate social responsibility programmes for the benefit of the local people; and

(f) if so, what the programmes are.
